Vamprah::

Vamprah was thinking about several things while she was admiring 
Alliance's base togheter Devilduel. That place made her remember 
several things about her past

Why had she betrayed at tht old fossil? 

First: she hated at her ex-leader.
Second... Well, she hadn't a second reason to do it...

What would happen with he?

She didn't know... at least the tasmanian-boy hadn't done more 
questiond about her interesting past.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Diamond::
> 
> she was sitting at a table, sipping on some gold energon.  She was 
> staring at the wall, her back to door. She was thinking about why 
she 
> even opened her mouth in the first place. RULE 1, NEVER TELL ANYONE 
> ANYTHING, so why did she?  RULE 2, THOSE WHO KNOW ANYTHING, YOU 
KILL, 
> so why hasn't she? She had thse questions running through her 
mind.  
> She also was trying to figure out what programs where her's and 
which 
> ones were those of the council's.  She sipped her drink absent 
> mindedly as she pondered her situation.  She wondered that if they 
> ever found out that she had the plans to the whole cybertron 
council 
> network.  Including the plans for an energy extractor that could 
pull 
> energy from the planet core and make enough energon cubes to run 
> Cybertron for the next 12 eons.  She sighed and told herself over 
and 
> over again, shut up, clam up and don't say another word to anyone 
or 
> your slagged and they will get the info.
